name: RetroFab [ EARLY ACCESS ]
description:
Playable 3D simulations of classic handheld electronic games including packaging and browseable instruction guides. Playable 3D simulations of classic handheld electronic games

I've spent the past couple of weeks ( okay, maybe it's been more like five or six weeks ) working
on a new platform for 3D handheld electronic game simulations that can be played in the browser.

I'm releasing in to early access the first three four (of hopefully many) simulations on this new platform.

Some of these will be rewrites of simulations from my Game & Watch Donkey Kong Collection with improved
3D models and more accurate gameplay (in other words, less bugs ;) But I'll also be expanding this new collection
with simulations of classic handheld games from other manufacturers, so be sure to check back often.

Features Each simulation in this new collection will contain the following: Gameplay Playable 3D simulation
of original handheld device Box Art Rotateable 3D views
of original packaging Instructions Browseable scans of
original instruction guides Early Access Try out these fully playable simulations in your browser before their official release. Donkey Kong Nintendo 1982 Play Frogger Coleco 1981 Play Mario Bros. Nintendo 1983 Play Lifeboat Nintendo 1983 Play In Development Preview the 3D assets (including box art and instruction guides) for these games currently in development.
They'll move into early access as soon as the playable simulations are completed. Donkey Kong Coleco 1982 Preview Donkey Kong II Nintendo 1983 Preview Prototypes Preview some initial 3D models for games where more research and artwork is still required.
If you have information about these games and would like to contribute leave a comment on the game's page. Back to the Future III Systema 1990 Preview Paperboy Tiger Electronics 1990 Preview Engine Room VTech 1984 Preview Star Trek First Contact Micro Games 1996 Preview
